name: The Farm 2018
description:
Start your agricultural career in The Farm 2018 on mobile and tablet!

Take control of your farm and its fields to fulfil your harvesting dreams.

It is time to FARMING!

You can test your harvesting,farming skills in awesome simulation.

FEATURES
- Complex Graphics and Real Physics Engine
- Ultra Detailed Vehicles
- Amazing Real Environment
- Huge Open World
- Make money by selling corn, wheel etc.
- Easy Tutorial
- Grow different plants
- Buy animals and manage them
- Purchase new fields

Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.

DOWNLOAD AND FARM NOW!
